dc_title_s: Nobilis Hannoniae com. descriptio; Auctore Iacobo Surhonio.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Engraving of Hannonii man and woman along right map border and two coats of arms above the title cartouche. Insets: views of Mons and Valenchiennes. The title cartouche states that the map was originally printed by Visscher in Harrlem in 1630. 1 map; 38 x 49 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Visscher, Claes Jansz., 1586 or 1587-1652, cartographer.,Surhon, Jacques, cartographer.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Atlantis Maioris Appendix, 1630.
